trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.

When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
Finalizes the composition.
Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.

The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionOffset%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The position at which the composition text occurs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput"></xref> event occurs.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput"></xref> event occurs.
Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput"></xref> event occurs.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The offset of the finalized text when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput"></xref> event occurs.
